title: One-of-a-kind restored Victorian, huge yard, pet-friendly
description:
The MacCarrol Manor House Estate dates back to the original William Penn land grant. The home was built in 1884. This lovely Victorian apartment is updated but retains its Old World charm. Flooded with natural light overlooking gardens. Enjoy nature year-round. Delightful vintage character includes: 10 foot ceilings, crown moldings, original oak hardwood floors, original floor-to-ceiling built-in corner hutch with hand-blown glass, gorgeous light fixtures, generous closets, and private basement. Grand spaces both inside and out. Raised-bed gardens available for planting! Pets welcome, too. You will enjoy high-efficiency stainless appliances and gas heat. Water and sewer are FREE! Easy access to Routes 309 & 202, as well as Interstates 476 and 276 and nearby train service. The MacCarrol estate is a short walk away from the historic William Penn Inn, and the nearby village of North Wales is a delightful community of cafes and shops. Other attractions in area include: charming Skippack Village for craft and antique lovers; the world-renowned King of Prussia Mall; historic Valley Forge national park with miles of hiking and biking trails; and the big-city attractions of Philadelphia a half-hour away.
*Please map the location before contacting us.
*Prices and availability subject to change.

description:

The apartment includes nine-foot ceilings, ceiling fans, washer and dryer hookups in a full basement, a well-equipped stainless kitchen (with gas stove and dishwasher), crown moldings, custom paint, original oak hardwood floors, and off-street parking. The building has front and back yards with graceful, mature landscaping. If you have a green thumb, you can plant veggies and flowers in the raised-bed gardens spots. title: 1 sunny bedroom $725 in 4 bed/2 bath townhouse close to Center City!
description:
The Room:
One bedroom will be available at the end of April 2023, when our current roommate leaves for med school. The available bedroom is on the second floor, and has three big windows which let in amazing natural light. The bedroom is directly connected to a bathroom shared with one other roommate. The bedroom easily fits a queen size bed, dresser, desk, and nightstands, and has two spacious closets.
The House:
4-bedroom, 2-bathroom townhouse in the Bella Vista neighborhood. The communal space (kitchen and living room) come fully furnished. There is a washer/dryer on the third floor, central heat/AC, and a dishwasher. There is also parking out back!
The Neighborhood:
The townhouse is located in a great neighborhood. It’s quiet yet close to transportation and restaurants/shopping. South Street, Broad Street, the Italian Market, and grocery stores like Sprouts, ACME, and Whole Foods are all within a 10-minute walk.
About Us:
We are three ladies in our 20s and early 30s who are friendly, communicative, and conscientious about keeping the common spaces tidy. We all work (physical therapist, school counselor, bartender), and are relaxed and respectful about having guests over.
About You:
We are seeking a roommate (women only) who is clean, respectful, and friendly. If interested, please email us with some information about yourself (age, background, current job/school plans, social media or LinkedIn profile, & anything else important) and let us know if you have any questions.
Rent is $725/month and utilities and internet are split equally four ways. No pets, unfortunately.
